Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Persistance

Class Persistence

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Persistance.Persistence
public class Persistence
extends java.lang.Object
Persistence Class contains attributes and methods used by the Server to remember all information needed when restarting the Server.

Attributes:

  • String "fileName": Name of the file to save information to
  • File "file": Used to write a .txt file containing persistence info to be used by the Server
  • boolean "gameStarted": Indicates whether a game already started or not
  • int "numberOfPlayers": Indicates the number of players of the game which already started
  • ArrayList<String> "playerNames": Contains the name of all players who joined the Server
  • int "wantsToRestart": Indicates the number of players who want to restart the game after the Server went down

    • createFile

      public void createFile() throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a new .txt file if it doesn't already exist.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there are problems when trying to check if the file exists.

    • writeFile

      public void writeFile​(boolean gameStarted, int numberOfPlayers, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> players)
      Writes information given into the .txt file.
      Parameters:
      gameStarted - boolean indicating if the Game already started.
      numberOfPlayers - number of players who are playing the game.
      players - ArrayList containing the name of the players who are playing the game.

    • readFile

      public void readFile()
      Reads the file and stores information inside the class itself.

    • resetFile

      public void resetFile() throws java.io.IOException
      Resets "persistence_info.txt" to initial conditions.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while creating a FileWriter.

    • testCreateFile

      protected void testCreateFile() throws java.io.IOException
      Method used to test the creation of a file to be written and read.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if problems occur when creating the file.

    • wantsToRestart

      public void wantsToRestart()
      Adds 1 to "wantsToRestart" attribute.

      To be called when the player wants to restart the game.

    • wantsToContinue

      public void wantsToContinue()
      Subtracts 1 to "wantsToRestart" attribute.

      To be called when the player wants to continue the existing game.

    • majorityWantsToRestart

      public boolean majorityWantsToRestart()
      Tells the Server if the players want to either restart or continue the game.
      Returns:
      true if the strict majority of players want to restart the game.

    • fileExists

      public boolean fileExists()
      Checks if "persistence_info.txt" exists.
      Returns:
      True if the file exists.
